title: Were-Dinosaurs: Curse of the Moon
description: You have just started Middle School. Already you're dealing with a homework, bullies, turning into a dinosaur. Wait . . . what? Travel to the fossil-ridden lands of Montana as you stumble upon a mysterious cave that turns you into a Triceratops, your best friend into a Stegosaurus, the class know-it-all into a Pterodactyl, and the school bully into the ferocious Tyrannosaurus Rex every time there is a full moon. Move over wolves. Now is the time for WERE-DINOSAURS!
author: S.B. Clark
